a=[0,1,6,1,6,5,6,1,6,1]
n=raw_input()
while n!='#':
    n=int(n)
    if n==1:
        print "1"
    elif n==2:
        print "5"
    elif n==3:
        print "4"
    else:
        s=14
        for i in xrange(4,n+1):
            x=str(i)[-1]
            s+=a[int(x)]
            
        print str(s)[-1]

    n=raw_input()
